articles.content: Ten years ago, my father-in-law fell 13 feet from the top of his tractor-trailer. Only after completing his delivery, driving 35 miles home and showering, did he finally go to the emergency departmen… [+6112 chars]

articles.author: Ian Wheeler
articles.title: Orange County readies second mass vaccination site at Soka University, tweaks appointment system - OCRegister
articles.description: The county has enough vaccines and staff on hand for a confident launch of the new Super POD (point-of-distribution) at Soka University, an official said.
articles.content:
Orange County staff and volunteers are gearing up for the opening of a mass vaccination center at Soka University in Aliso Viejo on Saturday.
It joins the first center the county opened last week at… [+3689 chars]

articles.author: Missoula Current
articles.title: Businesses sue Missoula Health Board after Gianforte drops COVID restrictions - Missoula Current
articles.description: The lawsuit comes in the wake of Gov. Greg Gianforte on Friday repealing most of former Gov. Steve Bullock’s COVID-19 directives, specifically those limiting the hours of operation and number of people allowed in establishments such as bars and restaurants.
articles.content: Missoula City-County Health Officer Ellen Leahy discusses the county’s goal to flatten the curve early in the pandemic. Gov. Greg Gianforte reversed many state COVID restrictions, prompting several b… [+6028 chars]

articles.author: abc15.com staff
articles.title: Arizona's largest county unable to schedule any more second vaccine doses - ABC15 Arizona
articles.description: Maricopa County Public Health sent out a cryptic tweet Thursday afternoon. It suggested those who’d received their first doses of the Pfizer vaccine at one of its five POD sites, may not be able to get their second dose on time or even at the same location.
